original: 張楊部下。曹操攻呂布時，因張楊乃呂布故交，打算出兵呼應，楊醜刺殺張楊，率軍投奔曹操，但隨即楊醜又被眭固所殺。
text: Zhang Yang's subordinates. When Cao Cao attacked Lu Bu, because Zhang Yang was the old friend of Lu Bu, he planned to send troops to respond. Yang Chou assassinated Zhang Yang and led his army to Cao Cao, but Yang Chou was killed by Suigu.
